main event: A pilot reported sighting one flying tube approximately 100 feet long while flying southwest of Boston, Massachusetts on June 10, 1949.
interesting points: The object was observed flying at an estimated speed of 100-150 mph,The pilot attempted to chase the object but lost sight of it due to overcast conditions,The object was noted to be white in color and had no visible exhaust or sound,The sighting occurred at an altitude of around 30,000 feet,The observer was a pilot from the 58th Fighter Squadron at Otis AFB.
location: 20 miles SW of Boston, Massachusetts, USA
witness description: pilot from the 58th Fighter Squadron at Otis AFB
